messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: bugs Was Re: Where do you find the biggest spider..
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/30/02 10:26:56 AM Central Daylight Time, ... Ohhh gawds, I hope so! :o) Cause this ugly guy needs to have something going for him. Are
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/30/02 10:26:56 AM Central Daylight Time,
SandraDodd@... writes:


> There are some big scary bugs named after the plants their moms tend to want
> to eat. I can't remember what ended up being the scariest one I ever saw,
> but it was named after some tree around us. And it was big and looked like
> some 11 year old boy had made it up, doodling monster-bugs.
>
> But look at the ugliness of squash bugs, potato bugs, and tomato worms!
> Whatever he is, I bet he's named after something pretty. <g>
>
> Sandra

Ohhh gawds, I hope so! :o) Cause this ugly guy needs to have something going
for him. Are squash bugs the ones that have an appendage on their head that
looks like a small elephant trunk?
~Nancy~ who can't believe she is spending this much time on bugs!


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
